Content.title: Paul Groves
Content.name: Paul Groves
Content.bodyText:
I work for in the marketing department of a UK based software company.

After joining the company in Dec 05 I researched CMS and foudn Umbraco.

I rebuilt the main site with Umbraco which was launched a couple of months ago and am working on more of the group's sites.

Think a UK Umbraco user group would be a great idea.
